title: ‘It's extremely important that a woman gets educated financially and plans her own financial needs’ - Mint
content: ‘It's extremely important that a woman gets educated financially and plans her own financial needs’  Mint
description: In the case of public sector banks, one study showed that the share of women in the officer category increased from about 7% in 2001, to about 14.4%, in 2011, says Usha Thorat, former deputy governor, RBI
